title: add default, no-op QParserPlugin.init(NamedList) method
description: Add default, no-op QParserPlugin.init(NamedList) method. ComplexPhraseQParserPlugin has a non-empty init method, all the (many) other sub-classes of QParserPlugin until now had their own no-op init method.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: Proposed patch against (git) master (formerly svn trunk).

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services

SOLR-8597: add default, no-op QParserPlugin.init(NamedList) method
